titles: Two letters the one from the Right Honourable, Sir Thomas Fairfax. The other from Colonell Ralph VVeldon. Being an exact relation of the raising of the siege, and releeving of the town of Taunton. Which was read in both Houses of Parliament on Wednesday being the 14. of May 1645. And commanded to be forthwith printed.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Weldon, Ralph.
publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Taunton (England) --  History --  Siege, 1645 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
